alert.note: Alert for Barton; Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 7:46PM CDT until June 14 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN RUSSELL AND NORTHWESTERN BARTON COUNTIES... At 746 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Milberger, or 9 miles southwest of Russell, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Russell, Dorrance, Milberger, Bunker Hill, Galatia, Wilson State Park, Wilson Lake and Russell Airport. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If on or near Wilson Lake, get away from the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. remember, lightning can strike out to 15 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
